1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | General utilities.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Class
6  ( Name (..),
7    Named,
8    named,
9    Index,
10    Collect,
11    Choose (..),
12  ) where
13
14-- | Types that has name.
15class Name a where
16    name  :: a -> String
17    names :: [a] -> [String]
18    names = map name
19
20-- | Entry in association list.
21type Named a = (String, a)
22
23-- | Create named pair.
24named :: (Name a) => a -> Named a
25named a = (name a, a)
26
27-- | Numerical index.
28type Index = Int
29
30-- | Wrap list.
31type Collect a = [a] -> a
32
33
34-- ----------------------  Choose
35
36-- | Choose one of two.
37class Choose m where
38    (<|>) :: m a -> m a -> m a
39
40instance Choose Maybe where
41    (Just a)  <|> _  = Just a
42    (Nothing) <|> b  = b
43
44instance Choose (Either a) where
45    (Right a)  <|> _  = Right a
46    (Left _)   <|> b  = b
47
